Embed

Use embed to insert content from other sources on your website

<div class="embed-container">
	<iframe src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/U9nnRicMHOk" title="School admissions, not preferred school"></iframe>
</div>

When to use embed

Use embed to insert an inline frame. An inline frame or iFrame is used to embed content in a webpage.

How to use embed

Accessibility

iFrame’s need to be titled using the title attribute. The title should identify to assistive technologies what the embeded content is.

  • Accessibility statement
